name: flowcrypt-browser
description: Simple end-to-end encryption to secure email and attachments on Google.

scripts.pretest: npm run-script build --silent && cd conf && node ../build/tooling/tsc-compiler --project tsconfig.test.json
scripts.test: npm run-script test_buf && npm run-script test_tslint && npm run-script test_patterns && npm run-script test_async_stack && npm run-script test_ci_chrome_consumer -- -- --pool-size=1
scripts.test_local_chrome_consumer_mock: npm run-script pretest && npm run-script test_ci_chrome_consumer -- -- --pool-size=1
scripts.test_local_chrome_enterprise_mock: npm run-script pretest && npm run-script test_ci_chrome_enterprise -- -- --pool-size=1
scripts.test_local_chrome_consumer_live_gmail: npm run-script pretest && npm run-script test_ci_chrome_consumer_live_gmail -- -- --pool-size=1
scripts.run_firefox: npm run-script build && npx web-ext run --source-dir ./build/firefox-consumer/ --firefox-profile ~/.mozilla/firefox/flowcrypt-dev --keep-profile-changes
scripts.run_firefox_windows: npm run-script build && npx web-ext run --source-dir ./build/firefox-consumer/ --firefox-profile %userprofile%/AppData/Local/Mozilla/Firefox/Profiles/flowcrypt-dev --keep-profile-changes
scripts.test_chrome_consumer_live_gmail: echo 'deprecated, call test_ci_chrome_consumer_live_gmail instead' && sleep 10 && npm run-script test_ci_chrome_consumer_live_gmail
scripts.test_chrome_consumer: echo 'deprecated, call test_ci_chrome_consumer instead' && sleep 10 && npm run-script test_ci_chrome_consumer
scripts.test_chrome_enterprise: echo 'deprecated, call test_ci_chrome_enterprise instead' && sleep 10 && npm run-script test_ci_chrome_enterprise

author: FlowCrypt Limited
